Articles.Content: I just wanted to thank you all because this is one of the nicest forums I go to. It very pleasant here compared to many other forums. Always a pleasure to come here. Im not going to name the other forums I speak of but I bet many of you feel the same with the forums you visit as well. So, I just wanted to express how awesome it is here and thank all those people who make it that way. Also want to thank the posters here for keeping it real. Even the complaint threads here are ok. You just dont get that at other forums. OH, and the game/simulation aint too bad either. Keep up the good work. That is all.

Agreed.

This place is like the polar opposite of Mos Eisley.

You will never find a more awesome hive of respect and politeness.

 

Edited October 20, 2017 by Rocket In My Pocket

It wouldn't be possible without so many great community members!

You guys help make our jobs so much easier.

That post successfully puts into words why this is the first forum I ever stuck around in

Oh, and moved to Kerbal Network because I'm evil
